summary: Jewel thieves attempt to recover treasure from piranha infested waters. Mistrust and betrayals happen amongst the gang in the quest for gold.
cast: Lee Majors|Karen Black|Margaux Hemingway|Marisa Berenson|James Franciscus|Roy Brocksmith|Dan Pastorini|Frank Pesce|Charles Guardino|Anthony Steffen|Fábio Sabag|Jorge Cherques|Chico Arago|Gary Collins|Sônia Oiticica|Celso Faria
director: Director: Antonio Margheriti (as Anthony M. Dawson)
title: Voracidad
